rows.label: tlk00350105_msg0001
rows.name:
Now that I'm in a teaching position,
I have no idea how to actually teach.

rows.label: tlk00350105_msg0002
rows.name:
It's like, I'm not as sharp
as the Boss was when he was doing it...

rows.label: tlk00350105_msg0003
rows.name: It's probably my teaching method that's bad.

rows.label: tlk00350105_msg0004
rows.name:
...*sigh* I hope the Boss
comes back soon.
